requirement_tested: Customer management module with CRUD operations for customer data
user_persona: An insurance agent named Sarah who manages client information.
user_goal: Sarah wants to add a new customer to the system quickly.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to Customers Section
narrative_steps.description: Sarah logs into the system and clicks on the 'Customers' tab to manage customer data.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Customers' navigation tab.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The customer management page loads with a table of existing customers and an 'Add Customer' button visible.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Add Customer Form
narrative_steps.description: Seeing no record for her new client, Sarah clicks the 'Add Customer' button to open the form.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Add Customer' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A modal form appears with fields for entering the customer's personal details.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting New Customer Details
narrative_steps.description: Sarah fills out all required fields accurately and submits the form.
narrative_steps.action: Fill in customer details and click 'Submit'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The form closes, and the new customer appears at the top of the customer list without needing a page refresh.

requirement_tested: Policy management module with CRUD operations for insurance policies
user_persona: An underwriter named James reviewing policy applications.
user_goal: James needs to create a new insurance policy for an existing customer.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Policies Module
narrative_steps.description: James navigates to the 'Policies' section from the main dashboard.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Policies' tab in the main navigation.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The policies view loads showing a list of current policies and options to filter or add new ones.

narrative_steps.title: Initiating New Policy Creation
narrative_steps.description: James finds the correct customer and clicks 'New Policy' to begin setting up coverage.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'New Policy' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A multi-step form opens prompting James to enter policy details linked to the selected customer.

narrative_steps.title: Completing Policy Setup
narrative_steps.description: After filling in the necessary information, James saves the new policy.
narrative_steps.action: Complete form steps and click 'Save Policy'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The newly created policy is added to the list and reflects the correct status and associated customer.

requirement_tested: Claims management module with CRUD operations for insurance claims
user_persona: A claims adjuster named Lisa handling filed incidents.
user_goal: Lisa wants to review and update the status of a submitted claim.

narrative_steps.title: Entering Claims Dashboard
narrative_steps.description: Lisa accesses the claims management area to check pending cases.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the 'Claims' section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A dashboard displaying claims in grid or timeline format with sorting and filtering tools appears.

narrative_steps.title: Locating Specific Claim
narrative_steps.description: Lisa identifies the relevant claim by its ID and clicks on it to see more details.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a specific claim entry.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The claim expands to show detailed information including incident description and claimed amount.

narrative_steps.title: Updating Claim Status
narrative_steps.description: After verifying documents, Lisa updates the claim status to 'Approved'.
narrative_steps.action: Select 'Approved' from the status dropdown and save changes.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The claim’s status updates immediately in the system and reflects the change visually.

requirement_tested: Data browsing interface for viewing customer, policy, and claims information
user_persona: A manager named Tom conducting periodic audits.
user_goal: Tom wants to browse through customer, policy, and claims data efficiently.

narrative_steps.title: Switching Between Data Views
narrative_steps.description: Tom starts by examining customer data and then switches to view policies.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Policies' tab after viewing customers.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The policies view loads instantly, replacing the previous customer data display.

narrative_steps.title: Sorting Data Columns
narrative_steps.description: To find recent entries, Tom sorts the claims table by filing date.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Filing Date' column header.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Claims are reordered chronologically with visual feedback confirming the sort direction.

narrative_steps.title: Performing Batch Actions
narrative_steps.description: Tom selects multiple claims to export for further analysis.
narrative_steps.action: Use drag-select to choose several rows and click 'Export Selected'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Selected claims are bundled and downloaded as a CSV file without errors.

requirement_tested: User authentication and authorization system for secure access
user_persona: A new employee named Alex joining the team.
user_goal: Alex needs to securely log into the insurance management platform.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Login Screen
narrative_steps.description: Alex opens the application and sees the branded login interface.
narrative_steps.action: Visit the application URL.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A centered login form with company branding and fields for username/password is displayed.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Credentials
narrative_steps.description: Alex enters his assigned credentials and presses Enter to submit.
narrative_steps.action: Enter username/password and press Enter key.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Authentication request is processed and Alex is redirected to the dashboard upon successful verification.

narrative_steps.title: Logging Out Securely
narrative_steps.description: At the end of the day, Alex logs out to ensure security.
narrative_steps.action: Click the profile menu and select 'Logout'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Session ends cleanly, and Alex is returned to the login screen with no residual access.

requirement_tested: Data analysis dashboard with visualization capabilities
user_persona: A business analyst named Priya tracking performance metrics.
user_goal: Priya wants to monitor key performance indicators through the dashboard.

narrative_steps.title: Loading Analytics Dashboard
narrative_steps.description: Priya navigates to the analytics section to get an overview of business health.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Analytics' link in the sidebar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Dashboard panels load showing KPIs like active policies, pending claims, and monthly revenue trends.

narrative_steps.title: Interacting with Metrics
narrative_steps.description: Curious about a particular metric, Priya hovers over it to understand how it was calculated.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over a metric value widget.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Tooltip appears explaining calculation method and time frame used for the displayed figure.

narrative_steps.title: Refreshing Data Dynamically
narrative_steps.description: To get the latest figures, Priya manually refreshes the dashboard.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Refresh' button on the dashboard toolbar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All dashboard data reloads dynamically without requiring a full page refresh.

requirement_tested: Reporting engine for generating various insurance business reports
user_persona: A compliance officer named Marcus preparing regulatory submissions.
user_goal: Marcus needs to generate a compliance report for audit purposes.

narrative_steps.title: Choosing Report Type
narrative_steps.description: Marcus goes to the reporting section and selects the compliance report option.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to Reports section and select 'Compliance' from category dropdown.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Relevant parameter fields for compliance reports populate automatically below the selection.

narrative_steps.title: Setting Parameters and Previewing
narrative_steps.description: He sets the required date range and previews the report output.
narrative_steps.action: Set date range and click 'Preview'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Sample report output renders in the preview pane showing formatted data based on selected parameters.

narrative_steps.title: Generating Final Report
narrative_steps.description: Satisfied with the preview, Marcus generates the final document for download.
narrative_steps.action: Click 'Generate Report'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: System processes the request asynchronously and provides a download link once ready.

requirement_tested: Interactive charts and graphs for data representation
user_persona: A sales director named Elena analyzing market trends.
user_goal: Elena wants to visualize policy sales trends using interactive charts.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Chart Visualization
narrative_steps.description: Elena visits the analytics dashboard to examine sales performance charts.
narrative_steps.action: Open the Analytics Dashboard.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Charts depicting policy trends appear within modular panels, styled consistently with dark cyan theme.

narrative_steps.title: Toggling Data Series Visibility
narrative_steps.description: She hides certain data series to focus on specific product lines.
narrative_steps.action: Click on legend item corresponding to a data series.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Selected data series disappears from the chart temporarily while others remain visible.

narrative_steps.title: Exploring Detailed Segment Information
narrative_steps.description: Elena hovers over a segment of the pie chart to get detailed breakdown.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over a slice of the pie chart.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Contextual label showing percentage and value for that segment overlays directly onto the chart.

requirement_tested: Frontend application that fetches all data from backend APIs
user_persona: A developer named Rajesh testing frontend-backend integration.
user_goal: Rajesh wants to verify that frontend correctly fetches live data from backend APIs.

narrative_steps.title: Triggering Initial Data Load
narrative_steps.description: Upon navigating to the customer list, Rajesh observes data loading behavior.
narrative_steps.action: Load the Customers module in browser.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Placeholder states appear briefly before actual customer data is fetched and rendered dynamically.

narrative_steps.title: Refreshing Module Data
narrative_steps.description: To test real-time sync, Rajesh manually triggers a data refresh.
narrative_steps.action: Click the refresh icon next to the module title.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Current view re-fetches data from backend endpoint and updates the display without full page reload.

requirement_tested: Backend API server connecting to PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
user_persona: A DevOps engineer named Omar responsible for deployment stability.
user_goal: Omar ensures the backend service connects properly to PostgreSQL using environment variables.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Backend Service
narrative_steps.description: Omar deploys the backend and starts the server process.
narrative_steps.action: Run `npm run dev` in backend directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Server initializes successfully and begins listening on the configured port with no connection errors.

narrative_steps.title: Testing Database Connectivity
narrative_steps.description: Omar makes an API call to confirm database connectivity.
narrative_steps.action: Send GET request to `/api/customers` endpoint.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Returns structured JSON response containing customer records retrieved from PostgreSQL database.

requirement_tested: Database schema design for customers, policies, and claims entities
user_persona: A database administrator named Chen overseeing data integrity.
user_goal: Chen wants to validate that the database schema matches application requirements.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Table Structures
narrative_steps.description: Chen examines the PostgreSQL database to verify table schemas align with specs.
narrative_steps.action: Query database metadata for tables: customers, policies, claims.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each table exists with correct columns, data types, primary keys, and foreign key relationships defined.

narrative_steps.title: Running Migration Scripts
narrative_steps.description: Chen executes migration scripts to apply latest schema definitions.
narrative_steps.action: Execute database migration scripts.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Schema updates are applied atomically ensuring consistency between app expectations and database structure.

requirement_tested: Search and filtering functionality across all data modules
user_persona: A support representative named Julia assisting clients remotely.
user_goal: Julia wants to quickly locate a customer's policy using search and filters.

narrative_steps.title: Using Global Search Bar
narrative_steps.description: Julia uses the universal search bar to look up a customer by name.
narrative_steps.action: Type customer name into global search box.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Debounced API calls return filtered results matching the keyword as she types.

narrative_steps.title: Applying Advanced Filters
narrative_steps.description: When too many results appear, Julia refines the search using status filters.
narrative_steps.action: Select 'Active' from policy status dropdown filter.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Displayed dataset narrows down instantly to only show active policies belonging to the searched customer.

requirement_tested: Responsive web interface with whitesmoke background and dark cyan themed elements
user_persona: A field agent named Miguel accessing the system on a tablet.
user_goal: Miguel wants to use the system smoothly on his mobile device with consistent styling.

narrative_steps.title: Resizing Browser Window
narrative_steps.description: Miguel resizes his browser window to simulate mobile screen size.
narrative_steps.action: Manually resize browser window to small dimensions.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Layout adapts responsively with collapsible sidebars and stacked content maintaining readability.

narrative_steps.title: Verifying Theme Consistency
narrative_steps.description: Miguel checks that color scheme remains consistent across different views.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate between modules observing UI elements.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Background stays whitesmoke throughout, with interactive elements consistently rendered in dark cyan.

requirement_tested: Concurrent development setup with npm run dev starting both frontend and backend
user_persona: A junior developer named Noah setting up his local environment.
user_goal: Noah wants to start both frontend and backend services simultaneously for development.

narrative_steps.title: Launching Development Servers
narrative_steps.description: Noah runs the concurrent development script to launch both parts of the application.
narrative_steps.action: Execute `npm run dev` from root project directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Two separate processes start—one for frontend asset serving and one for backend API hosting—monitored together.

requirement_tested: Package.json configuration with install:all script for simultaneous FE and BE installation
user_persona: A tech lead named Aisha onboarding a new team member.
user_goal: Aisha instructs the new hire to set up dependencies using a single command.

narrative_steps.title: Installing Project Dependencies
narrative_steps.description: Following instructions, the new developer runs the unified install script.
narrative_steps.action: Run `npm run install:all` from the project root.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Packages for root, frontend, and backend are installed sequentially without manual intervention.
